title: Vela OS
author: Cem Özçelik
excerpt: Vela OS is an AI-native operating system making startup investors 10x more accurate, compared to a traditional VC firm. With a swarm of AI agents, investors can discover growing markets, companies, people and make quant-driven decisions to maximize returns.

html:
Free Options

Vela OS is an AI-native operating system making startup investors 10x more accurate, compared to a traditional VC firm. With a swarm of AI agents, investors can discover growing markets, companies, people and make quant-driven decisions to maximize returns.
